001package org.relationlearn.util;
002
003import weka.core.Attribute;
004import weka.core.FastVector;
005
006/**
007 * Utility class used to represent the default class Attribute to be used in
008 * classifier training or instance classificaction.
009 */
010public class RelationClass {
011    
012    /**
013     * Numeric type attribute with values equal to the ones found in
014     * {@link org.relationlearn.util.RelationType}.
015     * 
016     */
017    public final static Attribute DEFAULT_CLASS;
018    
019    static {
020        FastVector values = new FastVector(3);
021        values.addElement(RelationType.ATTACK.toString());
022        values.addElement(RelationType.SUPPORT.toString());
023        values.addElement(RelationType.UNKNOWN.toString());
024        DEFAULT_CLASS = new Attribute("default-class", values);
025    }
026    
027    private RelationClass() {}
028
029}
